bibl.title: Data Processing and State Management in Late Ptolemaic and Roman Egypt: The project 'Synopsis' and the Archive of Menches.
Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013.

bibl.seg: Nicola Reggiani, Data Processing and State Management in Late Ptolemaic and Roman Egypt: The project 'Synopsis' and the Archive of Menches.

Tomasz Derda, Adam Łajtar & Jakub Urbanik (edd.), in cooperation with Andrzej Mirończuk & Tomasz Ochała, Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology, Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013.
